Detailed Description

Class generated from networklayer/contract/IPv6ControlInfo.msg by opp_msgc. 

 class IPv6ControlInfo
 {
     (true);
     int protocol enum(IPProtocolId);  
     IPv6Address destAddr; 
     IPv6Address srcAddr;  
     short hopLimit;       
     int interfaceId = -1;
 }
